title: DaffCompositeProductFacade
contents:
DaffCompositeProductFacade

A facade for interacting with the composite product state. Exposes many parts of the state for easy access and allows dispatching of actions. See the DaffCompositeProductFacadeInterface docs for more details.

Properties

Name
Type
Description

getDaffProductSelectors<T>()
hasDiscount
productPriceRangeHasDiscount
Returns whether a DaffPriceRange has a discount.

productPriceRangeHasPriceRange
Returns whether the min and max prices of a DaffPriceRange are different.
